wikipedia.title: Vein matching
wikipedia.summary: Vein matching, also called vascular technology, is a technique of biometric identification through the analysis of the patterns of blood vessels visible from the surface of the skin.

author.name: Maria Perifanou
author.description: ICT Researcher (PhD), Project coordinator at P.A.U Education Barcelona (Spain) & member of the OpenEducationEuropa.eu team. Originally from Thessaloniki, Greece
